long_description: Clean Streak degreaser was specially designed to clean White Lightening Lube off your chain. Melts away layers of White Lightening buildup that can occur after repeated periods of White Lightening lube. Cleans straight to the base metal and evaporates fast with no drying time, no residue and no wiping. Also ideal for cleaning disc brakes and other precision parts.
short_description: Clean Streak degreaser was specially designed to clean White Lightening Lube off your chain.
